Management API Reference for component=persistence

The configuration of the infinispan subsystem.

Attributes (2)

  • cache-loader-loads - The number of cache loader node loads.
    Type LONG
    Where is the attribute stored? runtime
    Access Type metric
    Stability Level default
    Raw DMR model

    "type" : {
        "TYPE_MODEL_VALUE" : "LONG"

    "required" : true,
    "nillable" : false,
    "stability" : "default",
    "access-type" : "metric",
    "storage" : "runtime",
    "restart-required" : null,
    "capability-reference" : null
}
